activity.title: Drag and drop multiple
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word(s) into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: They haven’t seen Finding Nemo yet.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Have you seen any good musicals <blank word="lately"/> ?

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Pam has <blank word="always"/> wanted to be an actress on a big screen.

question.text: I love the movie King Kong. I've seen it three times !

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I've seen Hitchcock’s Psycho. It was great!

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Actually, I <blank word="would rather"/> eat out tonight. I don't feel like cooking.
